51300.summary: Some customers in the Kildonan Drive, and Rossmere areas of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
51300.title: July 5 - Winnipeg (Kildonan Drive, Rossmere) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
